By air, Pellston airport is a quaint, small town airport about an hour away, with free parking!  Traverse City Airport is a little larger with more flights.  

Charlevoix is a four hour drive from Metro Detroit and a six hour drive from Chicagoland.
If you are staying in town, downtown Charlevoix is extremely walkable.  If you don't have a car and need a ride,
When in Charlevoix, check out some of the many quaint shops downtown.  While there, take a stroll in the newly renovated East Park and check out the boat docks and stream and ponds.

value: content=The Pellston Lodge Magnuson Hotel in Michigan is located 1 mile from the Maple River, a Blue Ribbon trout stream, and 20 minutes from either Lake Michigan or Lake Huron. Just a short walk to Pellston Regional Airport.
